title: riot pls came and have look at this
body: i just purchase the gift card at this morning(didn't see recharge system turn down) i just recharge at that time, so the riot point didn't add to my account, so when riot recharge system turn on, will my riot point add to my aacount? pls contact to me emaill : yuhuihe9@gmail.com

replies.body:
Hey there,

I suggest you remove your email from your post as this opens you up to potentially copious amounts of spam emails.

You'll have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support to have them check out the situation and add the RP to your account manually.
